title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Clarified backup storage requirement to specify the primary appliance's *data disk* (was "appliance disk").
Added note that IP allow lists do not restrict IdP provisioning (SAML/OIDC + SCIM) for Enterprise Managed Users.
Minor formatting fixes: added commas after "IP allow list" in UI instructions and updated a dropdown option.
summary:
- Clarified backup storage requirement to specify the primary appliance's *data disk* (was "appliance disk").
- Added note that IP allow lists do not restrict IdP provisioning (SAML/OIDC + SCIM) for Enterprise Managed Users.
- Minor formatting fixes: added commas after "IP allow list" in UI instructions and updated a dropdown option.
generated_title: Clarify backup data disk requirement and IdP exemption for IP allow lists

**6467e89**: [Improvement]: Add a Note to Mention that IdP Connectivity (OIDC/SAML + SCIM) will not be Impacted when IP Allow List is enabled at the Enterprise Level (#56494) (by Justin Alex)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Clarified backup storage requirement to specify the primary appliance's *data disk* (was "appliance disk").
- Added note that IP allow lists do not restrict IdP provisioning (SAML/OIDC + SCIM) for Enterprise Managed Users.
- Minor formatting fixes: added commas after "IP allow list" in UI instructions and updated a dropdown option.

### Title
Clarify backup data disk requirement and IdP exemption for IP allow lists
